title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the Distributed Tracing Visualizer, including the desired features, user personas, data sources, performance goals, and integration with existing monitoring and tracing tools.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the data ingestion pipeline, storage solution, and visualization components.

title: Implement Data Ingestion Pipeline
description: Develop the components responsible for ingesting and processing distributed tracing data from various sources.

title: Design and Implement Data Storage
description: Design and implement the data storage solution for storing and querying distributed tracing data.

title: Develop Visualization Components
description: Implement the user interface components for visualizing and exploring distributed tracing data.

title: Implement Security and Access Control
description: Design and implement security measures and access control mechanisms to ensure data privacy and secure access to the visualization tool.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure and set up a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the application.

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the Distributed Tracing Visualizer, covering installation, configuration, and usage.

title: Perform Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Conduct thorough testing and quality assurance activities, including unit testing, integration testing, performance testing, and user acceptance testing.
